channel.title: Just Football Highlights
channel.description: Premier League, La Liga and Champions League Highlights

item.title: Tottenham v Everton EPL highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Tottenham and Everton both needed a win in their chase for the top four, but had to settle for a point after a topsy turvy 2-2 draw. Adebayor put Spurs ahead in the first minute but Everton fought back with a header from Jagielka. Mirallas looked to have won it for the Toffees but Sigurdsson [...]
item.content:encoded: Tottenham and Everton both needed a win in their chase for the top four, but had to settle for a point after a topsy turvy 2-2 draw. Adebayor put Spurs ahead in the first minute but Everton fought back with a header from Jagielka. Mirallas looked to have won it for the Toffees but Sigurdsson grabbed a late equalizer.

item.title: QPR v Wigan EPL highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: A bizarre game between QPR and Wigan that ended in a 1-1 draw that didn’t really help either team. After Zamora was sent off for a crazy challenge, QPR hung on and took a late lead with a wonder strike from Loic Remy, but Maloney broke their hearts with an equalizer in injury time.
item.content:encoded: A bizarre game between QPR and Wigan that ended in a 1-1 draw that didn’t really help either team. After Zamora was sent off for a crazy challenge, QPR hung on and took a late lead with a wonder strike from Loic Remy, but Maloney broke their hearts with an equalizer in injury time.

item.title: Chelsea v Sunderland EPL highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Two big slices of luck gave Chelsea a 2-1 win over Sunderland in Di Canio’s first game in charge. Azpilicueta scored an own goal for Sunderland from a corner, but Kilgallon’s deflected own goal leveled it and another deflection off Ivanovic was cruel on Sunderland.
item.content:encoded: Two big slices of luck gave Chelsea a 2-1 win over Sunderland in Di Canio’s first game in charge. Azpilicueta scored an own goal for Sunderland from a corner, but Kilgallon’s deflected own goal leveled it and another deflection off Ivanovic was cruel on Sunderland.

item.title: Barcelona v Mallorca La Liga highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Barcelona eased to a 5-0 victory over Mallorca without most of the star players. Cesc Fabregas score his first ever hat-trick and Alexis got the other two, but the loudest cheer of the night came when Eric Abidal made his comeback after a liver transplant.
item.content:encoded: Barcelona eased to a 5-0 victory over Mallorca without most of the star players. Cesc Fabregas score his first ever hat-trick and Alexis got the other two, but the loudest cheer of the night came when Eric Abidal made his comeback after a liver transplant.

item.title: Real Madrid v Levante La Liga highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Real Madrid came from behind to win 5-1. Michel put Levante ahead after 31 minutes but five minutes later a fantastic volley from Higuain brought the champions level and three minutes later Kaka scored a penalty. Real struggled to secure the win, but Ronaldo finally did with five minutes to go, followed by a quick [...]
item.content:encoded: Real Madrid came from behind to win 5-1. Michel put Levante ahead after 31 minutes but five minutes later a fantastic volley from Higuain brought the champions level and three minutes later Kaka scored a penalty. Real struggled to secure the win, but Ronaldo finally did with five minutes to go, followed by a quick brace from Ozil.

item.title: Stoke City v Aston Villa EPL highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Stoke were dragged right into the relegation battle following a 3-1 home defeat by Aston Villa. Agbonlahor put Villa ahead, but Kightly levelled with 10 minutes left before Lowton came up with a spectacular volley and Benteke sealed the points in injury time.
item.content:encoded: Stoke were dragged right into the relegation battle following a 3-1 home defeat by Aston Villa. Agbonlahor put Villa ahead, but Kightly levelled with 10 minutes left before Lowton came up with a spectacular volley and Benteke sealed the points in injury time.

item.title: West Brom v Arsenal EPL highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Arsenal kept the pressure on top four rivals with a 2-1 victory at West Brom. Rosicky scored twice to put them in charge, but Mertesacker gave a penalty away and was sent off. Morrison scored it and Arsenal just held on for the points.
item.content:encoded: Arsenal kept the pressure on top four rivals with a 2-1 victory at West Brom. Rosicky scored twice to put them in charge, but Mertesacker gave a penalty away and was sent off. Morrison scored it and Arsenal just held on for the points.

item.title: Real Madrid v Galatasaray UCL highlights
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Real Madrid have one foot in the semi-final after beating Galatasaray 3-0 without having to work too hard. Ronaldo gave them an early goal and Drogba missed his best chance before Benzema and Higuain ended Turkish hopes.
item.content:encoded: Real Madrid have one foot in the semi-final after beating Galatasaray 3-0 without having to work too hard. Ronaldo gave them an early goal and Drogba missed his best chance before Benzema and Higuain ended Turkish hopes.

item.title: Real Zaragoza v Real Madrid La Liga highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Jose Mourinho had one eye on Galatasaray in the Champions League, and his weakened Real Madrid side were held to a 1-1 draw at Zaragoza. Rodri gave the home team an early lead which Ronaldo cancelled out after 38 minutes.
item.content:encoded: Jose Mourinho had one eye on Galatasaray in the Champions League, and his weakened Real Madrid side were held to a 1-1 draw at Zaragoza. Rodri gave the home team an early lead which Ronaldo cancelled out after 38 minutes.

item.title: Celta Vigo v Barcelona La Liga highlights
item.dc:creator: Debs
item.description: Barcelona rested some player ahead of the Champions League trip to PSG, and could only manage a draw with Celta Vigo, who took the lead through Insa. Tello equalised before Messi scored for the 19th league game in a row but Ounubia’s late goal earned Celta a point.
item.content:encoded: Barcelona rested some player ahead of the Champions League trip to PSG, and could only manage a draw with Celta Vigo, who took the lead through Insa. Tello equalised before Messi scored for the 19th league game in a row but Ounubia’s late goal earned Celta a point.
